'''Copper bars''' are [[copper]] variants of [[bars]]. Unlike [[iron bars]], they are colored copper orange and can [[oxidize]] over time, similar to other copper blocks.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Copper bars can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, nothing is dropped.

{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Copper Bars|Pickaxe|Wood}}

=== Waxing ===
Like other copper blocks, the waxed variant can be obtained by {{Control|using}} a [[honeycomb]] item on the block.

== Usage ==
{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all bars|Bars#Usage}}

=== Oxidation ===
{{main|Oxidation}}
Non-waxed copper bars have four stages of oxidation (including the initial normal state). [[Lightning bolt]]s and [[axe]]s can remove the oxidation on copper bars. They can be waxed with [[honeycomb]] to prevent oxidation from progressing.

As the block begins to oxidize (exposed), it gets discolored and green spots begin to appear. As the oxidation continues (weathered), the block is a green color with brown spots. In the last stage (oxidized), the block is teal with several green spots.
